column1: Quotes
"Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle." - Christian D. Larson
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." - Eleanor Roosevelt
"The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it."
"Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful." - Albert Schweitzer
"Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this."
"The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams." - Oprah Winfrey
"Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful." - Joshua J. Marine
"You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great." - Zig Ziglar
"Success is not in what you have, but who you are."
"The best way to predict the future is to create it." - Peter Drucker
"Believe you can and you're halfway there." - Theodore Roosevelt
"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today." - Franklin D. Roosevelt
"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill
"Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going." - Sam Levenson
"In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity." - Albert Einstein
"Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life." - Steve Jobs
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do." - Steve Jobs

"Success is not in what you have, but who you are."
"Sometimes you have to let go of the life you planned to embrace the life you have."
"The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow."
"Don't let the darkness of the past overshadow the brightness of the future."
"The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of others, but those who win battles we know nothing about."
"You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice."
"The scars you have are a testament to the strength you possess."
"Tough times never last, but tough people do."
"Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over."
"The pain that you've been feeling can't compare to the joy that's coming."
"In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity."
"You are allowed to scream, you are allowed to cry, but do not give up."
"The only way to heal a broken heart is to turn to Allah."
"Every ending is a new beginning."
"The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow."
"The strongest people are not those who never fail, but those who rise after every fall."
"Don't let your fear of what could happen make nothing happen."
"Sometimes Allah breaks your heart to save your soul."
"Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life."
"When Allah is all you have, then you realize that Allah is all you need."
"Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart."
"The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself."
"When nothing goes right, go to Allah in prayer."
"It's okay to be a glowstick. Sometimes we need to break before we shine."
"Never give up on something you believe in. Your time will come."
"Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle."
"You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it."
"You are far too smart to be the only thing standing in your way."
"Sometimes you have to go through the worst to get to the best."
"Don't let yesterday take up too much of today."
"No matter how hard it gets, keep going. You will overcome."
"The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow."
"You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think."
"The best view comes after the hardest climb."
"Every storm runs out of rain."
"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
"Let your dreams be bigger than your fears and your actions louder than your words."
"The best revenge is to improve yourself."
"Be the reason someone believes in the goodness of people."
"Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life."
"Believe in miracles. Remember that Allah can do anything."
"Your time is coming. Just be patient."
"The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow. In every challenge, there is an opportunity for growth."
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall."
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
"Your journey has molded you for the greater good. It was exactly what it needed to be. Don't think that you've lost time."
"Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if one only remembers to turn on the light."
"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
"When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us."
"Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop."
"Never underestimate the power of a kind word or deed."
"Believe you can and you're halfway there."
"When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go."
"Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle."
"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."
"Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it."
"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts."
"What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us."
"The best way to predict your future is to create it."
"Verily, with hardship, there is ease."
"Indeed, Allah is with the patient."
"O Allah, if You see me getting farther away from You, return me to You in a beautiful way."
"Tie your camel and trust in Allah."
"The heart is in need of constant remembrance of Allah."
"The more you trust in Allah, the easier it becomes to rely on Him."
"Don't be sad. Allah is with us."
"The tears that fall from the eyes of a believer, out of love and fear of Allah, will prevent the Fire of Hell from touching his face."
"No one has ever made a sacrifice for Allah except that Allah replaced it with something better."
"Allah does not burden a soul beyond its capacity."
"The closest that a servant can be to his Lord is when he is in prostration."
"The trials of life are not meant to break you but to make you."
"Every difficulty is a chance to purify your heart and draw closer to Allah."
"Allah is the only one who can mend a broken heart."
"The pain that you've been feeling can't compare to the joy that's coming."
"Sometimes the hardest thing and the right thing are the same."
"When you're feeling down, remember that Allah is always near."
"The only way to heal a broken heart is to turn to Allah."
"Patience is not about how long you can wait, but how well you behave while waiting."
"The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of Allah."
"Remember, Allah will never leave you empty-handed."
"The greatest reward comes with the greatest trial. When Allah loves a people, He tests them."
"When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray."
"Sometimes Allah allows us to be broken so that we can be made whole again."
"Allah tests those whom He loves."
"In every tear, there is wisdom. Sometimes you need to cry to let go of the pain."
"Allah doesn't make mistakes. He makes miracles."
"The heart that beats for Allah never gets tired."
"When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place."
"Don't be sad, for Allah is with us."
"Allah loves those who are patient in adversity."
"Allah knows what is in every heart."
"Prayer is the key to all problems. Take it to Allah before you take it to anyone else."
"Sometimes Allah takes away something to replace it with something better."
"Allah's plan is always the best plan."
"Never underestimate the power of a sincere prayer."
"Allah doesn't make mistakes, but He tests you to make you realize your strengths."
"Trust in Allah when things don't go your way. His plan is always better than yours."
"When you're feeling down, remember that Allah is always near."
"The more you thank Allah, the more He blesses you."
"Don't be sad, for Allah is with us."
"Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear."
"Allah tests those whom He loves."
"Pray, not because you need something, but because you have a lot to be thankful for."
"Don't worry, Allah is preparing you for something great."
"Allah is always listening, even when you're silent."
"In every test and trial, there is a lesson and a blessing."
"Allah's plan is always better than your desires."
"Allah is the best of planners."
"When you're feeling down, turn to Allah in prayer. He will lift you up."
"Allah is always with you, even when it feels like everyone else has left."
"Allah's love for you is greater than your mistakes."
"When you're going through a difficult time, remember that Allah is testing you because He believes in your strength."
"Trust in Allah's timing. His plans are always perfect."
"Allah's mercy is greater than any mistake you've made."
"Allah will never leave you empty-handed. Trust in His plans."
"When you feel lost, remember that Allah is the best guide."
"Allah's love is the greatest comforter in times of sadness."
"Allah is close to the brokenhearted."
"Allah is the source of all strength. Turn to Him in times of weakness."
"In every difficulty, there is an opportunity for growth."
"Allah does not burden a soul beyond its capacity."
"Turn to Allah in times of sadness. He is the ultimate source of comfort."
"Allah is with the patient."
"Remember, Allah is always watching over you."
"Trust in Allah's plan. He knows what is best for you."
"Allah's love for you is greater than any pain you're feeling."
"Allah's mercy is greater than any mistake you've made."
"Allah is the best of planners. Trust in His guidance."
"Allah is always near. Turn to Him in times of need."

"Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear."
"Allah's love for you is deeper than any ocean."

"Allah is always there for you, even when it feels like no one else is."
